task_list.instruction_title:
CHECK COMPTA EOD*1

C1440 - Fiduciary Deposits : Deal Transfers - without anomalies

C1400 - Fiduciary Deposits : Deal Transfers - with balance anomalies 
C6540 - Client Loans - deals transfers with other anomalies
C6520 - Client Loans - deals transfers without anomalies 
C6480- Client Loans - deals transfers with balance anomalies 
C6280 - Les comptes réconciliés sans différence de solde (Hors bilan) 
C6260 - Les comptes réconciliés sans différence de solde (Au bilan)
C6141 - GL ACCOUNT / Transfert with balance anomalie - Balance sheet accounts (Côté UBP) 
C6121 - GL ACCOUNT / Transfert with balance anomalie - Balance sheet accounts (Côté UBP) 
C6140 - GL ACCOUNT / Les comptes réconciliés sans différence de solde Hors bilan 
C6120 - GL ACCOUNT / Transfert without balance anomalie - Balance sheet accounts
C6100 - GL ACCOUNT / Transfert with balance anomalie - Off Balance sheet accounts 
C6080 - GL ACCOUNT / Transfert with balance anomalie - Balance sheet accounts 
C6580 - Forex Forwards - Deal transfers without anomalies
C6560 - Forex Forwards - Deal transfers with other anomalies
C6540 - Forex Forwards - Deal transfers with balance anomalies
